name: Nullified
description:
Description

An evil army has constructed a tower that heavily nullifies magical energies as part of an invasion of the kingdom. To defend against this attack, their most powerful mage is sent to reach the tower and undo its magic suppressing effect.

Key features

  • Control the kingdom's strongest mage
  • Traverse through multiple levels
  • Defeat or dodge evil enemies and their variations
  • Reach the tower and achieve victory
  • Enjoy a bopping original soundtrack

All for free!

Developed by Jake Roxburgh

Hi, I'm Jake. I make art, music, and games.
